title: Kobe Bryant, Google Commercial, Shameful Texts, Kylie Jenner and more.
itunes:title: Kobe Bryant, Google Commercial, Shameful Texts, Kylie Jenner and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Snap, crackle and pop we got the ingredients to make it do what it does? Carnation Condensed Milk anyone??? Kobe Bryant's death has reminded us all of how precious life is. The NBA has officially postponed the Lakers VS Clippers game. Google premiered a commercial called most searched. It is about how African-Americans have dominated public fascination. Federal investigators are now trying to find what caused the helicopters failure. The crew give us their personal questions that they would ask their favorite football player. Have you ever sent a shameful text by accident? This helicopter accident hits home for Kylie Jenner. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog speaks about doing better and being better, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
